org.apache.giraph.conf

类 ClassConfOption<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.AbstractConfOption
      • org.apache.giraph.conf.ClassConfOption<C>
  • 类型参数:
    C - interface of class
    所有已实现的接口:
    Comparable<AbstractConfOption>

    public class ClassConfOption<C>
extends AbstractConfOption
    Class configuration option

      • getClassesOfType

        public static <T> Class<? extends T>[] getClassesOfType(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                        String name,
                                        Class<T> xface,
                                        Class<? extends T>... defaultValue)
        Get classes from a property that all implement a given interface.
        类型参数:
        T - Generic type of interface class
        参数:
        conf - Configuration
        name - String name of property to fetch.
        xface - interface classes must implement.
        defaultValue - If not found, return this
        返回:
        array of Classes implementing interface specified.

      • addToClasses

        public static <T> void addToClasses(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                    String name,
                    Class<? extends T> klass,
                    Class<T> xface)
        Add a class to a property that is a list of classes. If the property does not exist it will be created.
        类型参数:
        T - type of class
        参数:
        conf - Configuration
        name - String name of property.
        klass - interface of the class being set.
        xface - Class to add to the list.
